titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the Emergency Medical Services for Children program.
Emergency Medical Services for Children Program Reauthorization Act of 2018
Emergency Medical Services for Children Program Reauthorization Act of 2018
Emergency Medical Services for Children Program Reauthorization Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Emergency Medical Services for Children Program Reauthorization Act of 2018
This bill reauthorizes the Emergency Medical Services for Children grant program through FY2024. The program is administered by the Health Resources and Services Administration and focuses on improving emergency health care for children who are seriously ill or injured.
